overview: On November 11, 2011, people across the world were invited to 'capture' a part of their day using film, photography, music and sound. Submissions from all corners of the globe were received and weaved into the narrative fabric that is the 11Eleven Project. EVERYTHING you see and hear was recorded on 11/11/11
tagline: This is not a film about our planet - it is a film about our people.
title: 11Eleven Project
